messages.title: 5 MORE YEARS OF LABOUR OR CHANGE WITH THE CONSERVATIVES
messages.content: In just a few weeks we will have the most important election for a generation. Our broken city and tired Hospitals need bold and clear action to break up the establishments that are a part of our failed system as it is. We can't go on like this.

messages.title: VOTE NEIL HUDSON FOR THE CHANGE WE NEED
3 POSITIVE REASONS TO VOTE FOR NEIL HUDSON
messages.content:
Neil brings real life experience to politics - As well and University tutor & public health vet, Neil had life experience to better inform his decision to represent the people in the parliament.
Neil believes in politics is all about public trust - Neil listens to your votes and concerns and will champion these issues at the Westminster, working with the local and national level people.
Neil passionately believes in positive politics - Neil would take over the issues honestly and try to create active change for Edinburgh Southin in a manner of mutual respect to deliver stability and difficult times.

messages.title: A RECORD OF ACTION IN EDINBURGH SOUTH
messages.content: As your candidate since 2007, Neil has worked hard in our community. Councillor Mark McInnes comments: "I have had the privilege of working closely with Neil as he has campaigned locally for the things people care about. He is an impressive individual who gets things done."

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Conservatives are determined to ensure the Council Tax rise inflicted on you is the last in the loop, the gravity is deep and freeze the rising Labour and the Lib Dems' Council Tax freeze have voted for and supported it. No to Tax increases. Yes to action now.

issues.economy: 5 more years of Labour or change with the Conservatives.

leaflet.personalStatement: Neil brings real life experience to politics. Neil believes politics is all about public trust. Neil passionately believes in positive politics.

politicalExperience.achievements: Informed decisions to better represent people in parliament.
Worked hard in our community. Campaigned locally for the things people care about.

endorsements.endorsement: I have had the privilege of working closely with Neil as he has campaigned locally for the things people care about. He is an impressive individual who gets things done.

images.caption: Shadow Defence Secretary supporting Neil Hudson
